projects.title: AI CPA Agentic Research System
projects.description: LLM-powered assistant for tax return analysis and optimization. Built with Python, LangChain, and PydanticAI.

projects.title: Equipment Energy Optimizer (MARL)
projects.description: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning system using Proximal Policy Optimization to optimize manufacturing equipment scheduling. Treats machines as independent agents that autonomously prioritize high-solar and off-peak windows, achieving a projected 25% reduction in energy costs while maintaining >99% job completion rate.

projects.title: Autonomous Visual QA Assistant
projects.description: Computer vision pipeline automating quality control using YOLOv8 for detection, MobileNetv2 (CNN) for classification, and a Multimodal LLM for defect analysis. Achieved 99.97% detection accuracy and projected 38% reduction in monthly quality costs (over $96k annually). Automates 'Rework' vs. 'Discard' decisions in seconds.

projects.title: Photosynthesizers - Milwaukee Domes
projects.description: Interactive mobile-first web application for the Milwaukee Domes conservatory enabling plant discovery through AI-powered image recognition. Features BioCLIP for plant classification, GPT-4 for health assessment, multi-language support (English, Spanish, Chinese), and crowd-sourced plant health monitoring. Built with React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and Supabase.

projects.title: Diabetes Prediction (Random Forest)
projects.description: ML pipeline for diabetes prediction using statistical tests and Random Forest with comprehensive data preprocessing.

projects.title: Custom Wordle Game
projects.description: Java-based Wordle game with admin tools, SQL database, and modular testing for QA.

projects.title: Automated XML Schema Documentation
projects.description: RAG CI/CD pipeline using Python and ML to automate XSD documentation and analysis.

projects.title: This Website!
projects.description: Website built using modern web development tools! Feel free to see how I made it.

projects.title: Campaign Poster Management
projects.description: Full-stack application for managing campaign posters with user authentication and image upload.
